name: Zoya
greetingText: I'm so fortunate to have met you in the most beautiful moments of life
wishText: May your youth never fade and may every year be filled with joy!
textInChatBox: Wishing you a very very very sincere Happy Birthday!!! Lots and lots of happiness...
text4: I realized I wanted to do something
outroText: I hope this little surprise brought a smile to your face!
